com.konakartadmin.bl

Class AdminConfigCacheUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.konakartadmin.bl.AdminConfigCacheUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AdminConfigCacheUpdater
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread which runs forever. At a regular interval it checks to see whether the cache of configuration variables needs updating and updates it if required.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Method Detail

      • setCheckInterval

        private void setCheckInterval()
                       throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                              KKAdminException
        Set the interval for checking the configuration flag. In a multi-store scenario the config variable containing the interval will be read from the store set for the engine that started this thread.
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception
        KKAdminException - an unexpected KKAdminException exception

      • stopLooping

        public void stopLooping()
        Stop the current thread from looping

      • run

        public void run()
        This thread runs forever. At a regular interval it checks to see whether the cache of configuration variables needs updating and updates it if required. Under certain conditions this thread continues even when the main application has been stopped.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • updateConfigs

        private void updateConfigs()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads a config variable for all stores and decides whether or not to do the update based on whether the config variable was modified since last time it was read.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • addConfigMgrToMap

        private AdminConfigurationMgrIf addConfigMgrToMap(java.lang.String storeId)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Add an engine to the engine map
        Parameters:
        storeId - the storeId
        Returns:
        the AdminConfigurationMgr instance that was also added to the map
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • getConfigsInMultiStoreSharedDBMode

        private KKConfiguration[] getConfigsInMultiStoreSharedDBMode()
                                                      throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException,
                                                             com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException,
                                                             com.konakart.app.KKException
        An array of KKConfiguration objects is returned; one for each store. If a config with key ADMIN_CONFIG_CACHE_CHECK_FLAG doesn't exist for a store, then that store is never refreshed.
        Returns:
        Return an array of KKConfiguration objects
        Throws:
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException - an unexpected exception in Torque (the database layer)
        com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException - an unexpected exception due to data in Torque (the database layer)
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception
